functionDecorators.name: close
functionDecorators.description: Allows for the beneficiary to withdraw their funds, rejecting further deposits.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Stores funds that may later be refunded.

parameterDecorators.name: refundee
parameterDecorators.description: The address funds will be sent to if a refund occurs.

functionDecorators.name: enableRefunds
functionDecorators.description: Allows for refunds to take place, rejecting further deposits.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

returnDecorators.description: The current state of the escrow.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraw accumulated balance for a payee, forwarding all gas to the recipient. WARNING: Forwarding all gas opens the door to reentrancy vulnerabilities. Make sure you trust the recipient, or are either following the checks-effects-interactions pattern or using {ReentrancyGuard}.

parameterDecorators.name: payee
parameterDecorators.description: The address whose funds will be withdrawn and transferred to.

functionDecorators.name: withdrawalAllowed
functionDecorators.description: Returns whether refundees can withdraw their deposits (be refunded). The overridden function receives a 'payee' argument, but we ignore it here since the condition is global, not per-payee.
